title: Spring Vegetable Soup with Herb Cubes

ingredients.content: 2 slices white bread, torn in pieces
2 carrots (approx. 150 g), cut in sticks (1 cm x 4 cm)
Â½ leek (approx. 100 g), cut in sticks (1 cm x 4 cm)
150 g celeriac, cut in sticks (1 cm x 4 cm)
2 vegetable stock cubes (for 0.5 l each), crumbled

preparations.content: Place bread, parsley, chervil, milk, eggs, salt and pepper in mixing bowl then chop <b>6 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside. Clean mixing bowl.
Place Varoma dish into position then weigh in carrots, peas, leek and 100 g celeriac. Make sure some holes remain uncovered for steam to circulate then set Varoma aside.

Place onions, remaining 50 g celeriac, tomatoes, water, soy sauce, vegetable stock, garlic, salt and pepper in mixing bowl. Place covered Varoma into position then cook <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>. Meanwhile, heat oil in a non-stick frying pan over a medium heat then add reserved egg mixture and cook for approx. 3 minutes on each side or until cooked. Transfer to a paper towel and leave to cool then cut into cubes (1 cm).
Remove Varoma and divide vegetables between serving bowls. Strain soup through a sieve into bowls with vegetables, garnish with herb cubes and serve hot.
